executable.title: Full Frame Tracks
executable.description: Takes a Video and Generates Full Frame Tracks for the Video
executable.acknowledgements: This work is part of the DIVE project.

directory.name: DIVEDirectory
directory.description: An input DIVE Directory. If no default is specified, the current directory is used,
directory.label: Input DIVE directory

string.name: notificationText
string.label: NotificationText
string.description: Simple Text to display in the UI Notification

integer.name: selectedTrack
integer.description: Optional Track to select (-1 is default/no vale)
integer.label: Select TrackId

integer.name: selectedFrame
integer.description: Optional Frame to jump to (-1 is default/no vale)
integer.label: Select Frame

parameters.label: Girder API URL and Key
parameters.description: A Girder API URL and token for Girder client
